textBox.richText: Today we conquered over 1800 feet of the CN Tower - the worlds largest free standing structure. Its height is breathtaking and you really got a good sense of how far up you are from the glass floor. We’ve had a couple of magic days in Toronto with James and Steph. Yesterday evening we traveled to Toronto Island via the ferry and took some amazing pictures of the city skyline. We’ve had so much fun with them both its hard to say goodbye. Hopefully we’ll all catch up really soon!! Tomorrow we are off to the Canadian Rockies so blog updates may be few and far between due to the risk of being in Internet darkness for a few days.
